sentence: — Governor Mike DeWine (@GovMikeDeWine) February 26, 2022 In a tweet, Saturday, Texas Governor Greg Abbot (R) “asked the members of the Texas Restaurant Association, Texas Package Stores Association & all Texas retailers to voluntarily remove all Russian products from their shelves.” I’ve asked the members of the Texas Restaurant Association, Texas Package Stores Association & all Texas retailers to voluntarily remove all Russian products from their shelves.

sentence: — Governor Mike DeWine (@GovMikeDeWine) February 26, 2022 DeWine also declared Sunday a Day of Prayer in Ohio to honor the people of Ukraine, where the country’s flag was flown at the Statehouse and governor’s residence to support the people in the country as well as Ukrainians in the state.
